page.title: Calpers Tendered Its PeopleSoft Shares
page.text: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Calpers, the biggest U.S. pension fund, said on Thursday that it had tendered its 1.5 million shares of PeopleSoft Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=PSFT.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">PSFT.O</A> to Oracle Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ORCL.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ORCL.O</A>, accepting its \$8.8 billion hostile takeover bid.
